CustomField.description: This will tell you the expected revenue from an opportunity based on the close date and the days between the end of the close date's year. For example if close date is 03/01/2020 and the amount is 120,000, the formula calculates days between 03/01/2020 to the end of the year (12/31/2020) . The value is 305 days . The formula will then take the percent of (3005/365) * amount and you get $100,274. That is an estimate of how much potential revenue you should expect to see from this opportunity based on the year of the close date.
CustomField.label: Current Year Est Revenue
